title: Home | Chiropractor in Portage, WI | Beard Chiropractic Family Wellness Clinic
description: Home in Portage, WI. Beard Chiropractic Family Wellness Clinic is your local Chiropractor in Portage serving all of your needs. Call us today at 608-742-2333 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Beard Chiropractic Family Wellness Clinic! We are dedicated to educating and helping as many people as possible in our community to experience better health and well being without the use of drugs or surgery. We will consistently deliver excellent service to all who come to us, and offer the community a place where they feel that they are truly cared about, in addition to being cared for. If you are new to our website, please feel free to discover and learn about chiropractic wellness. If you are interested in starting your journey towards wellness please subscribe to our award winning newsletter. If you are already a newsletter subscriber, please explore the member wellness section of our website for wellness articles, resources, and health facts---specifically targeted by Dr. Danny Beard to your wellness needs and interests.
